title: "AI Helps Biotech Labs Generate the Building Blocks for New Drugs"
excerpt: "The only proteins we can use to create drugs are the ones we know. But what if we could add new proteins to the resource pile? Two biotech labs have begun using artificial intelligence (AI) to generate novel proteins with the goal of incorporating them into medicine."
